fullText:
The best content on X is neither short form nor long form. It‚Äôs medium form: 1-2 paragraphs. 

It‚Äôs just short enough to hook someone and explain something interesting. But it‚Äôs not too long that people leave before reacting to it.

Basically, this exact post.
